roleset.name: denounce

roles.note: Literally 'to remove the skin,' and thus equivalent to 'flay'.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'excoriate' based on sentences in wsj. VN class judgement-33. Framenet entry Judgement communication.

example.name: passive
example.text: In return, [Mrs. Thatcher]-1 is excoriated *trace*-1 from Fleet Street to Paris as an obstructionist.

roleset.name: damage or remove part of a surface
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharpe data. Comparison to flay.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: arg 0 rather than arg 2 because this caused skin damage
example.text: Face and chest, excoriated by inflammed papules.
